DOC.brief_summary: In study , 400 Hispanic woman recruit randomized one three intervention : 1 . Control ( change ) ; 2 . A low-intensity information program , consist video approach educate woman importance cervical cancer screening ; 3 . A high intensity program consist video plus 'promotora ' lay-community health educator lead intervention participant 's home encourage cervical cancer screening . The investigator compare intervention effective encouraging Hispanic woman undergo cervical cancer screening ( Pap test )
DOC.brief_title: Cervical Cancer Screening Among Hispanic Women
DOC.criteria: Female 21 64 year age Hispanic Latina Resident Yakima Valley , WA , USA No hysterectomy Last PAP test ( cervical screening ) 3 year ago Last see local clinic le 5 year ago Less 21 great 64 year age PAP test le 3 year ago Prior hysterectomy
